department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Automotive Engine Repair Services for CFB Trenton
description: It is a request for standing offer for the provision of automotive engine maintenance and repair services. Specific details: the automotive engine shall be of make and model used by the Canadian Forces, that is a CF-104 G Model as per current replacements. .The contract start date is 11 December 2023 and will expire on 31 October 2026.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Tender Announcement for Automotive Engine Repair Services at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Trenton**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Standing Offer (RFSA) for Automotive Engine Repair Services at CFB Trenton. This RFSA is a reissue of the previous solicitation.

**Solicitation Details**
------------------------

*   Solicitation Number: WS4074909462
*   Reference Number: WS4074909462-DOC4257812855
*   Amendment Number: 0
*   Publication Date: October 13, 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: November 2, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
*   Expected Contract Start Date: December 11, 2023
*   Expected Contract End Date: October 31, 2026

**Service Description**
----------------------

This RFSA is seeking to establish standing offers for Automotive Engine Repair Services at CFB Trenton. The successful bidder(s) will provide maintenance and repair services for vehicles at the Base.

**Bidder Information**
-----------------------

*   Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Regions of Opportunity: None
*   Regions of Delivery: Quinte West
*   Contact Information: Crystal Denton, [crystal.denton@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:crystal.denton@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Submission Requirements**
---------------------------

Bidders must submit their proposals electronically through the Ariba Discovery platform. The RFSA document and submission requirements are available on the platform.

**Notice URL**
---------------

The RFSA document and supporting information can be accessed at the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17714772?extsite=MTc3MTQ3NzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.

**Conclusion**
--------------

The PSPC is seeking qualified bidders to provide Automotive Engine Repair Services at CFB Trenton. The successful bidder(s) will be established on a standing offer and will be required to provide maintenance and repair services for vehicles at the Base. We look forward to receiving proposals from qualified bidders.===========================================================================================

Note that this is now a properly formatted markdown
